Title: Detective Conan: Captured in Her Eyes
Writer: Gosho Aoyama (creator), Kazunari Furuuchi (screenplay), Eric Vale (head writer), Matt Chaney (script writer)
Actors: Laura Bailey, Anthony Bowling, Doug Burks, Chris Cason
Plot: 3 Police officers got killed. Then Ran saw the murderer killing her best friend and she lost her memory. Now Conan and Inspector Megure are trying to find the murderer.
